572 JFK’s Anti-Trump Grandson Launches Campaign to Replace Democrat Jerry Nadler (slaynews.com) posted 7 hours ago by Sea_Still 53 comments award share report block JFK's Anti-Trump Grandson Launches Campaign to Replace Democrat Jerry Nadler - Slay News John F. Kennedy’s grandson, Jack Schlossberg, announced Tuesday that he is running for Congress to replace longtime Democrat Rep. Jerry Nadler (D-NY) in the House of Representatives. slaynews.com
